instruction: Summarize the main points of the following article about social media and its impacts.
input: Social media has become an incredibly powerful tool in the 21st century. It allows people to instantly share images and videos, connect with friends around the world and access news and updates from a variety of sources. While this can be a positive thing, there are some downsides, too. Social media can become a time-sink, taking time away from more productive activities, and can have a serious impact on a person’s mental health. It can also be used to spread false information and cyberbullying.
output: Social media can be a powerful and positive tool for connecting with people and accessing news and updates, but it can also be a time-sink that affects mental health and can be used to spread misinformation and cyberbullying.
